snippet: "Masters of Sex" stars Michael Sheen and Lizzy Caplan as the sex researchers William Masters and Virginia Johnson, while "Ray Donovan" stars Liev Schreiber as a professional trouble-shooter in Los Angeles.
abstract: "Masters of Sex" stars Michael Sheen and Lizzy Caplan as the sex researchers William Masters and Virginia Johnson, while "Ray Donovan" stars Liev Schreiber as a professional trouble-shooter in Los Angeles.

headline.main: Showtime Adds New Series: 'Masters of Sex' and 'Ray Donovan'
